sections.text: You wake up in what seems to be a dark prison cell, on an old wooden bed. Metal bars are preventing you to escape from the room. There is no window.

options.description: You try to open the door

sections.text: You don't see anything, it's too dark.

options.description: Try to scan the area with your hands

consequence.text: As you move your hands left and right under the bed, you cut yourself on a rusty nail.

sections.text: You found what seems to be a door key.

options.description: Try to open the door with the key

consequence.text: You're getting a little more crazier...

sections.text: The door opens. You are now free...
